increase florality.description: Enhance floral notes with cooler temps, gentle spiral pours, and high-flow filters. Keep contact time low to preserve volatile aromatics.

increase body.description: Boost body using higher temp, stronger agitation, and denser pours. Lower ratio and longer contact promote thickness.

syrupy body.description: Achieve a syrupy cup with intense agitation, small grind size, low ratio, and slow filters. Extracts more solubles per gram.

reduce bitterness.description: Reduce bitterness by minimizing turbulence, using gentle agitation, and slightly cooler water.

highlight acidity.description: Emphasize bright acidity with coarse grind, minimal agitation, and clean continuous flow. Short contact avoids over-development.

increase sweetness.description: Promote sweetness using stable temperature, medium grind, and moderate agitation with pulsed pour pattern.

enhance clarity.description: Clarity is best with fast drawdown, low turbulence, and coarser grind. Avoid excess contact to limit muddy flavors.

mellow profile.description: Soften harsh or acidic notes with cool water, relaxed pour, and minimal disturbance. Works well with delicate or older beans.

highlight fruit notes.description: Bring out fruity layers through medium agitation and spiral pours. Pair with anaerobic or natural process beans.

balance cup.description: A balanced cup across the board with no extremes. Useful as a default if no preference is set.
